issue.title: [Rust] Write datetime information for Date64 Type in csv writer
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11443](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11443). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Date64 datatype encodes date and time information in ms. The current csv writer only writes the date, making it impossible to serialize and deserialize whilst retaining the same precision.
